Kip runs a Tyrus blog and no one can convince me otherwise.

Nobody in this show is straight despite what the Disney propagandists may tell you

summary: So let me get this STRAIGHT:
body:
So let me get this STRAIGHT:


Buffy and Jonah can each be in a new het ship out of nowhere without any build-up or warning no questions asked


Yet


Tyrus, the most popular ship on Andi Mack, and one of the most popular ships on all of Tumblr right now, with so much build-up and chemistry and subtext, is still in question of canonocity.

summary: Too much gay for Disney but I'd love a story line where TJ and Cyrus face a homophobia storyline. Mabey TJ's team not accepting...
question: Too much gay for Disney but I'd love a story line where TJ and Cyrus face a homophobia storyline. Mabey TJ's team not accepting him as being gay and make fun of them both. After the situation is resolved they get called to Dr Metcalf's office to talk about it and he's just like "it gets better" .
answer:
he’s like “it gets better” and they’re both like ‘How would you know?’ ‘You can’t possibly know what this feels like’ and Metcalf is like, ‘Well, I actually have a husband, so I think I might relate a little.’ 

I think it would be a great storyline though, I just know we aren’t getting it. But i really really at least want Cyrus/TJ being able to connect to an adult about their situation. It would be so important and my heart would truly belong to this show

reblog.comment:

I think it would be a great storyline though, I just know we aren’t getting it. But i really really at least want Cyrus/TJ being able to connect to an adult about their situation. It would be so important and my heart would truly belong to this show

Tyrus stan🌈

Tj Kippen has all my uwu’s

summary:
Luke: Peyton wake up!
Peyton: W-What’s wrong?
Luke: Shrek 5 comes out in 2020 and will be about shreks backstory and how he came...
body:
Luke: Peyton wake up!

Peyton: W-What’s wrong?

Luke: Shrek 5 comes out in 2020 and will be about shreks backstory and how he came to be and i’m so excited, Was he born an ogre? Was he cursed? Will we see baby shrek? Angsty teen shrek? I need answers.

Peyton: Did you honestly break into my house in the middle of the night to discuss shrek?

title: At The Bottom Of Everything
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2FyZBmo

by Brynn_elle

This is the original prompt but I changed it up a bit. Yes there’s more but I won’t reveal that until the next chapter is posted!

Tj and Cyrus keep their relationship secret, but they both agreed on that. After a while Tj still doesn’t want to be as public with the relationship and Cyrus does so Cyrus gets upset and ignores Tj. He vents to Buffy and considers ending the relationship all together and Buffy says give Tj another shot, Cyrus keeps ignoring Tj.

Words: 1902, Chapters: ½, Language: English

Series: Part 3 of Tyrus Short Stories

  • Fandoms: Andi Mack - Fandom
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: TJ Kippen, Cyrus Goodman, Buffy Driscoll, Andi Mack, Iris (Andi Mack), Reed, aka Blondie
  • Relationships: TJ Kippen/Cyrus Goodman
  • Additional Tags: Andi Mack - Freeform, Tyrus - Freeform, two parts because drama, relationship fic, secret relationship beech


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2FyZBmo

blog.name: notsoscarylemonblueberry
blog.title: of course i came :)
blog.description: || manasa, she/her, 15 || just your local tyrus stan :) || side blog, main is @manasavalluru || this is a safe zone for everyone, not the place to start a ship war! ||

summary: happy thanksgiving to everyone who celebrates it!
body:
happy thanksgiving to everyone who celebrates it!

just want to take a moment to express my gratitude for this show and everything about it.

to the glory of andi mack itself, i can’t begin to explain everything that it means to me. seeing an asian character who represents creativity instead of the usual only-focused-on-studies-and-nothing-else stereotype is something i unfortunately didn’t even know i needed until i saw it. disney has a way of making asian characters super stereotypical and i’m so happy this show diminishes that completely. aside from personal relations to these characters, it’s amazing to know that anyone is able to see themselves in the characters. lgbtq+ youth or jewish people can see themselves in cyrus, asians can see themselves in the mack family, african americans can see themselves in buffy (and now, kira), kids with mental health issues can see themselves in jonah, kids with learning disabilities can see themselves in tj, kids facing financial issues at home can see themselves in amber, people who have faced the loss of a close family member or friend can see themselves in bowie, and anyone with any kind of “different” family situation can see themselves in literally any of the characters in this show because none of them that we know of have a “normal” one (and, let’s not forget that we have a deaf character coming up soon as well). amazing.

to the INCREDIBLE cast and crew of this show, are there even words? they constantly inspire us to be unique and be ourselves and express who we are freely. to our king, @persongoingfast himself, there aren’t enough words in the english language to tell you what you mean to not only me, but this entire fandom. we love you so, so very much.

and lastly, to this fandom. you guys gave me so much hope about this show when i wasn’t sure what was going to happen, and it’s the reason i came in the first place. all of you constantly inspire me with your kindness and positivity and optimism and my heart overflows with love for you guys. thank you for everything.

💛

just want to take a moment to express my gratitude for this show and everything about it.

to the glory of andi mack itself, i can’t begin to explain everything that it means to me. seeing an asian character who represents creativity instead of the usual only-focused-on-studies-and-nothing-else stereotype is something i unfortunately didn’t even know i needed until i saw it. disney has a way of making asian characters super stereotypical and i’m so happy this show diminishes that completely. aside from personal relations to these characters, it’s amazing to know that anyone is able to see themselves in the characters. lgbtq+ youth or jewish people can see themselves in cyrus, asians can see themselves in the mack family, african americans can see themselves in buffy (and now, kira), kids with mental health issues can see themselves in jonah, kids with learning disabilities can see themselves in tj, kids facing financial issues at home can see themselves in amber, people who have faced the loss of a close family member or friend can see themselves in bowie, and anyone with any kind of “different” family situation can see themselves in literally any of the characters in this show because none of them that we know of have a “normal” one (and, let’s not forget that we have a deaf character coming up soon as well). amazing.

to the INCREDIBLE cast and crew of this show, are there even words? they constantly inspire us to be unique and be ourselves and express who we are freely. to our king, @persongoingfast himself, there aren’t enough words in the english language to tell you what you mean to not only me, but this entire fandom. we love you so, so very much.

and lastly, to this fandom. you guys gave me so much hope about this show when i wasn’t sure what was going to happen, and it’s the reason i came in the first place. all of you constantly inspire me with your kindness and positivity and optimism and my heart overflows with love for you guys. thank you for everything.

💛

summary: Buffy bullies Jonah while Marty bullies her. I don’t think she can really win when it comes to ships.
question: Buffy bullies Jonah while Marty bullies her. I don’t think she can really win when it comes to ships.
answer: i wouldn’t call either interaction bullying, especially when compared to the way tj treated her, so i can’t really get behind your statement that she can’t “win”. i think the muffy/juffy interactions come across as joking with a little competitive edge bc?? that’s who buffy is as a character

Nobody in this show is straight despite what the Disney propagandists may tell you

summary: What is Walrus if you don't mind me asking? There are just too many ships going about in the fandom right now and my little...
question: What is Walrus if you don't mind me asking? There are just too many ships going about in the fandom right now and my little peanut brain can't handle it all. Also, I think you said you don't ship Bex and Bowie might I ask why? Just curious.
answer:
Walrus is WalkerxCyrus, a ship that first appeared when Walker character was mentioned waaay before Bash Mitzvah aired, with some initially thinking he was going to be Cyrus’s love interest. Now it’s just a fun crackship.

As for Bexie, it’s not that I don’t ship it, it’s more I couldn’t give less of a fuck about it and that’s mainly because I just don’t think Bex and Bowie are interesting as a couple. So the fact that there’s been a lot of time dedicated to it in the past few episodes is mildly irritating since I just couldn’t care less about these two’s relationship.
